item.title: Big Lots to reopen 132 stores in May. Here's where.
item.description: Big Lots, which once looked headed for the retail scrap heap, now plans to expand in more than a dozen states.

item.title: Chapter 7 vs. Chapter 13 bankruptcy: Which is better for credit card debt?
